summary: The code is a Bash script that uses the "links" command to dump HTML content from the specified URL (https://hbr.org/2016/11/what-artificial-intelligence-can-and-cant-do-right-now) and saves it into a file named "example/0.log" using the "cat" command for output redirection. This could be used to extract website data or analyze its structure.
